name: Planetary Destruction
description:
Fly around in search of a safe planet to land on. Discover what happened to the others, and try and survive long enough to do so. Can you survive in the bullet hell space shooter game?

There is currently 1 enemy type and 1 level but plans for 5 of each in total.
There are currently 4 ship options that are unlockable, there are plans for more.
There are plans for 3 boss fights.
There are plans for a story mode.
